alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 02 at 8:19AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF LAKE EFFECT SNOW MOVING INTO CENTRAL ERIE COUNTY... HAZARDS...A band of developing lake effect snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one half mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 816 AM EDT, a band of heavy lake effect snow was near Woodlawn Beach State Park, or near Lackawanna moving northeast at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, Lackawanna, Depew, Amherst, Lancaster, Williamsville, Elma, Small Boat Harbor, Erie Basin Marina, Blasdell, Elma Center, and Woodlawn Beach State Park. This includes the Skyway, Interstate 190 and Interstate 90 between exits 50 and 56. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
